CheckTitle: Ensure MFA Status for Admin Roles is Monitored
Description: Checks if MFA status for admin roles is monitored and data is available.
Risk: If MFA status for admin roles is not monitored, privileged accounts may be at risk of compromise.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Azure Portal (https://portal.azure.com). 2. Navigate to Azure Active Directory > Security > MFA. 3. Review MFA status for admin roles.

Recommendation.Text: Monitor and enforce MFA for all admin roles to reduce risk of compromise.

Notes: This check validates that MFA status for admin roles is monitored and data is available.
